title: The Sacrament (Bread)
steps: Prepare the sacrament table with clean cloth and trays.
Break the bread into small pieces and reverently cover the trays.
Kneel and offer the sacrament prayer over the bread.
Pass the bread to the congregation in an orderly, quiet manner.
prayer: O God, the Eternal Father, we ask thee in the name of thy Son, Jesus Christ, to bless and sanctify this bread to the souls of all those who partake of it; that they may eat in remembrance of the body of thy Son, and witness unto thee, O God, the Eternal Father, that they are willing to take upon them the name of thy Son, and always remember him and keep his commandments which he has given them; that they may always have his Spirit to be with them. Amen.

title: The Sacrament (Water)
steps: Prepare the water trays and reverently cover them.
Kneel and offer the sacrament prayer over the water.
Pass the water to the congregation in a quiet, steady manner.
Return trays and restore the table with reverence.
prayer: O God, the Eternal Father, we ask thee in the name of thy Son, Jesus Christ, to bless and sanctify this water to the souls of all those who drink of it; that they may do it in remembrance of the blood of thy Son, which was shed for them; that they may witness unto thee, O God, the Eternal Father, that they do always remember him, that they may have his Spirit to be with them. Amen.

title: Administering to the Sick
steps: Consecrate olive oil for the anointing, if it has not been prepared.
Two or more Melchizedek Priesthood holders place hands on the head.
One holder anoints with oil and states the anointing by authority.
Another holder seals the anointing and gives a blessing as guided.
prayer:
Brother/Sister [Name], by the authority of the Melchizedek Priesthood, I anoint you with this oil that has been consecrated for the healing of the sick.

Brother/Sister [Name], by the authority of the Melchizedek Priesthood, we seal this anointing upon you and bless you according to the inspiration of the Holy Ghost.

title: Confirmation (Gift of the Holy Ghost)
steps: Confirm the member of record by name.
State the ordinance: confirmation and bestowal of the Holy Ghost.
Give a blessing as prompted by the Spirit.
Close in the name of Jesus Christ.
prayer: Brother/Sister [Name], in the name of Jesus Christ, and by the authority of the Melchizedek Priesthood, we confirm you a member of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints and say unto you: Receive the Holy Ghost.
